event.title: 2010 census of whom 902,731 are in the built-up area made

data.event: Its population is 5,707,801 at the 2010 census of whom 902,731 are in the built-up area made of 3 out of 4 urban districts (Weibin, Hongqi and Muye).

event.title: a few years, Huixian and Weihui cities as well as Fengquan district and Xinxiang county will be added

data.event: As the city is expanding very quickly, in a few years, Huixian and Weihui cities as well as Fengquan district and Xinxiang county will be added to the built-up area.
